loading.description: Message to display when draw tool is loading

stamps_title.description: Title for the choose a stamp tool

eraseDrawing_button.description: Title for the erase drawing tool button

eraseDrawing_dialog_title.description: Title for the erase drawing dialog

eraseDrawing_dialog_warning.value: 警告！这将擦出你当前的绘图并用缺省状态将其替换。
eraseDrawing_dialog_warning.description: Warning text for the erase drawing dialog

eraseDrawing_dialog_instructions.value: 如果你想继续，请点击“确定”。
eraseDrawing_dialog_instructions.description: Instructions text for the erase drawing dialog

description_header_add.description: Link text for the header of the description input block

description_header_title.description: Title text for the header of the description input block

description_header_label.description: Label text for the header of the description input block

description_header_labelSnapshot.description: Label text for the header of the description input block when snapshots (frames) are enabled

description_header_maximized.value: （请在下面的方框中输入你的文本）
description_header_maximized.description: Instructions text for the header of the description input block

description_edit_link.description: Text for the edit description link/button

description_edit_title.description: Title text for the edit description link/button

importStudentAsset_button.description: Title for the import student asset tool button

prompt_title.description: Title text for the prompt (instructions) link/button

autoGrade_confirm.value: 你还有{0}次机会接收对你的回答的反馈，所以这应当是你最好的回答！你是否准备好接收这个问题的反馈了？
autoGrade_confirm.description: Confirmation message to show users when they are submitting an answer for auto grading and feedback

autoGrade_result.value: 自动评分系统返回了{0}之{1}。
autoGrade_result.description: Feedback showing users the auto score resulting from their submission

autoGrade_complete.value: 好样的！你已经用完了所用发送的机会。如果需要，您可以继续编辑您的绘图。
autoGrade_complete.description: Confirmation message alerting users that they have used all of their auto score submissions

autoGrade_submissionComplete.description: Confirmation message to display when users submit an auto scored answer

sizeLimit_title.description: Title text for dialog alerting users that the drawing has exceeded the allowed file size

sizeLimit_warning.value: 警告：你当前的绘图太大。
sizeLimit_warning.description: Warning text for dialog alerting users that the drawing has exceeded the allowed file size

sizeLimit_instructions.value: 如果你想保存这个绘画，请删除图片中的一些物品。谢谢！
sizeLimit_instructions.description: Instructions text for dialog alerting users that the drawing has exceeded the allowed file size

snapshots_header.description: Header text for the snapshots (frames) panel

snapshots_closeTitle.description: Title/tooltip text for the link to close (hide) the snapshots panel

snapshots_playback_playOnce.description: Title/tooltip text for the button to play through the snapshots like a flipbook animation one time

snapshots_playback_playLoop.description: Title/tooltip text for the button to play through the snapshots like a flipbook animation on a loop

snapshots_playback_pause.description: Title/tooltip text for the button to pause snapshot playback

snapshots_playback_speed.description: Title/tooltip text for the slider control to edit the speed at which snapshots are played back

snapshots_playback_units.description: Text for the unit measurement (per second) of the speed at which snapshots are played back

snapshots_addNew_title.description: Title/tooltip text for add new snapshot (frame) link

snapshots_addNew_link.description: Text for add new snapshot (frame) link

snapshots_toggle_title.description: Title/tooltip text for the link to toggle snapshots (frames) panel opened and closed

snapshots_toggle_link.description: Text for the link to toggle snapshots (frames) panel opened and closed

snapshots_dialog_delete_title.description: Title for the delete snapshot (frame) dialog

snapshots_dialog_delete_warning.value: 警告！本操作是永久性的。
snapshots_dialog_delete_warning.description: Warning users will see when they attempt to delete a snapshot

snapshots_dialog_delete_confirm.description: Confirmation text users will see when they attempt to delete a snapshot

snapshots_dialog_tooMany_title.description: Title for the dialog alerting users when they attempt to add a snapshot but have reached the maximum number allowed

snapshots_dialog_tooMany_warning.value: 对不起！你只可以使用{0}个快照。
snapshots_dialog_tooMany_warning.description: Warning for alerting users when they attempt to add a snapshot but have reached the maximum number allowed

snapshots_dialog_tooMany_instructions.value: 如果你想生成另外一个快照，请点击你想要删除的快照的右上角的“X”以删除当前快照中的某个快照。
snapshots_dialog_tooMany_instructions.description: Instructions for users when they attempt to add a snapshot but have reached the maximum number allowed

snapshots_snapHover.value: 点击打开；点击并拖拉以重新排序
snapshots_snapHover.description: Mouseover/tooltip text for a snapshot thumbnail

snapshots_snapDelete_title.description: Title/tooltip text for delete snapshot links
